name: Fish Physics
description:
Ludum Dare #37: One Room

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=92549

This was my first Ludum Dare game, and it definitely turned out more experimental than the original plan.

----

Make sure to hit the DONE button when you're happy with your universe to see a message.

Once you have some elements added (and some light), you can use the arrow keys to orbit and zoom. You can reset everything with RESET to try again.

Tell me what your fish's name was in the comments! Sorry if it blasted off into space, physics are hard.

----
Built in Unity with Blender, Photoshop, sfxr, and Garage Band. (Yes, there is sound, but you need to add something first).

Note: The buttons to create elements will be obscured unless your window is tall enough. Sorry!
